get.summary: Get list of products from the parser

get.description: Returns details of a specific transport based on the provided ID

post.description: Creates a new transport with the provided data

put.description: Updates an existing transport based on the provided ID

delete.description: Deletes an existing transport based on the provided ID

created_at.description: Метка времени создания записи о продукте

updated_at.description: Метка времени последнего обновления записи о продукте

logs.description: Информация о журнале для продукта, включая дату и соответствующие данные

message.example: You don't have permissions to process this request
